[`func scaled(by: Size3DFloat) -> Vector3DFloat`](/documentation/spatial/vector3dfloat/scaled(by:))Returns the vector scaled by the specified size.[`func scaledBy(x: Float, y: Float, z: Float) -> Vector3DFloat`](/documentation/spatial/vector3dfloat/scaledby(x:y:z:))Returns the vector scaled by the specified values.[`func uniformlyScaled(by: Float) -> Vector3DFloat`](/documentation/spatial/vector3dfloat/uniformlyscaled(by:))Returns the entity uniformly scaled by the specified scalar value.
